articles.author: Marika Gerken, CNN
articles.title: After 14 boys, this Michigan family finally welcomes a baby girl
articles.description: Kateri and Jay Schwandt have finally welcomed a baby girl to their family -- after nearly three decades and 15 tries.

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Memorable 'Jeopardy!' moments
articles.description: The world has changed a great deal, but the love for "Jeopardy!" has not.

articles.author: Jazmin Goodwin, CNN Business
articles.title: 'Jeopardy!' episodes hosted by Alex Trebek will air through December 25
articles.description: For the next six weeks, "Jeopardy!" will continue to air episodes hosted by Alex Trebek, who died of pancreatic cancer Sunday.

articles.author: Opinion by Lindsay M. Chervinsky
articles.title: Why we should fear a lame-duck President Trump
articles.description: In the short months before Trump leaves office, he could do things like declassify sensitive information, preemptively try to issue blanket pardons and continue to erode confidence in both the presidency and our elections, writes Lindsay M. Chervinsky.

articles.title: Kamala Harris' ancestral village in India celebrates her victory
articles.description: The village of Thulasendrapuram celebrated Harris' election win with fireworks, music and a mural in her honor.

articles.author: Elizabeth Landau, CNN
articles.title: Why pancreatic cancer is so deadly
articles.description: Pancreatic cancer is the third-leading cause of death from cancer in the United States, after lung and colorectal cancers, according to the National Cancer Institute.
articles.content:
(CNN)"Jeopardy!" host Alex Trebek died on Sunday more than a year after he announced he had been diagnosed with stage 4 pancreatic cancer.

articles.author: Manu Raju and Ted Barrett, CNN
articles.title: Challenge: Democrats fear McConnell veto over Biden agenda
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden's agenda in Washington may only go as far as Mitch McConnell lets him.

articles.author: Alexis Benveniste, CNN Business
articles.title: Brian Stelter turned off Trump tweet notifications live on air
articles.description: With 73 days left of the Trump presidency, CNN's Chief Media Correspondent Brian Stelter turned off his notifications for Donald Trump's tweets live on air Sunday during "Reliable Sources."

articles.author: John Sinnott, CNN
articles.title: Kevin de Bruyne misses penalty as Manchester City and Liverpool draw
articles.description: Kevin de Bruyne missed a penalty as Manchester City and Premier League champion shared a 1-1 draw on Sunday at the Etihad Stadium.

articles.author: Blake Ellis and Melanie Hicken, CNN
articles.title: Arkansas police chief resigns after calling for violence against Democrats
articles.description: An Arkansas police chief who posted calls for violence against Democrats on social media resigned from his job on Saturday.

articles.title: Alex Trebek supported many causes. These were some of his favorites
articles.description: For more than three decades, viewers came to know Alex Trebek as the face of the hit TV game show "Jeopardy!" But lesser known was his charitable work and all the time and money he gave to a number of causes, from health care to hairy creatures.&#

articles.title: A look back at Alex Trebek's legendary career
articles.description: Legendary host Alex Trebek died at his California home surrounded by his friends and family, according to a tweet from the official account of the game-show "Jeopardy!"

articles.author: Eric Bradner and Sarah Mucha, CNN
articles.title: Biden plans executive actions that would undo Trump's policies
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden has pledged to reassert the United States' leadership role on the global stage through a series of day-one executive actions that would mark a drastic turn from outgoing President Donald Trump's policies.
